alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 11:01AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHARLOTTE AND NORTH CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 AM EST... At 1101 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Palmona Park, or 10 miles southeast of Punta Gorda, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Babcock Ranch, Babcock Webb Wma, and North Fort Myers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
